column5: We are gearing up for the 2012 Legend Dealer meeting in Whitefish, Ontario. We have refreshed 9 V-Hull models, Introduced New Pontoon layouts and also added some new Tillers. YES folks Tiller models. Dealers will come far and wide to view and test the models. Here is a picture of our showroom transformed into a fashion show.    I'll post more after the dealer meeting. Now back to work I go
Looking forward to seeing the new stuff..wish i was getting it haha
Ha ha ha, looks like a night club I used to work at.  Can't wait to see the new line.  Toys are always fun to look at....
Pretty sure that's actually the stage at Fanny's in North Bay... next stop Sudbury !
lol wayne, for some reason fanny's is real close to the snowmobile trail though i am pretty sure i wouldn't own a legend unless it was free
LOL Thank you for all the comments. I'll give you OFNer's the first look to the all new design before launch date 2012 Toronto Boat Show
